title: Ticket #7790: Windows my_popen() can't run scripts
description:
HTCondor doesn't currently support running a script on Windows in certain cases. This includes MACHINE_RESOURCE_INVENTORY_<NAME> in the startd and scheduler-universe jobs in the schedd.

In the startd, the MACHINE_RESOURCE_INVENTORY_<NAME> invocation is via my_popen(), which should probably just share the Windows-specific code to look extensions up in the registry with Create_Process().

The problem in the schedd is probably similar.

This is similar to #7791, but would permit non-Python scripts.
